subtitleNullable: A dataset of claims and facts in Persian investigated by Factnameh.org
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Factnameh is a fact checking websites in Persian  which investigates and fact-checks claims by politicians, Internet users, organisations and individuals in Iran.  However, you should note that  Factnameh's  is not an impartial  fact-checking websites is really questionable and its conclusions should be taken with a grain of salt.  For example, Factnameh might only investigate claims that can be in line with its political agenda.
Nevertheless, Factenameh's content can be a good source for data scientists and machine learning researchers that work on disinformation and fake news detection on web.

### Content
I scraped this  dataset from Factnameh.org.  Each record corresponds to a claim that Factnameh probed and labeled as true or false. The metadata for each claim such as date and the entity who made the claim were also collected.

## مقدمه
فکت نامه یک وبسایت حقیقت سنجی و بررسی صحت فارسی است که به صورت خاص بر روی ایران تمرکز می کند. این وبسایت ادعاهای سیاستمداران، سازمان ها، افراد و حتی کاربران اینترنت را مورد بررسی قرار می دهد و صحت یا عدم صحت آن ها را می سنجد. با این حال توجه کنید که فکت نامه یک وبسایت بی طرف نیست و حقیقت سنجی های آن می تواند جهت دار و گمراه کننده باشد.  به صورت خاص فکت نامه تنها ادعاهایی را مورد بررسی قرار می دهد که از نظر سیاسی در جهت فکری و اهداف آن ها است نه لزوما همه ادعاهای مهم.
title: Factnameh
subtitle: A dataset of claims and facts in Persian investigated by Factnameh.org
description:
### Context

Factnameh is a fact checking websites in Persian  which investigates and fact-checks claims by politicians, Internet users, organisations and individuals in Iran.  However, you should note that  Factnameh's  is not an impartial  fact-checking websites is really questionable and its conclusions should be taken with a grain of salt.  For example, Factnameh might only investigate claims that can be in line with its political agenda.
Nevertheless, Factenameh's content can be a good source for data scientists and machine learning researchers that work on disinformation and fake news detection on web.

### Content
I scraped this  dataset from Factnameh.org.  Each record corresponds to a claim that Factnameh probed and labeled as true or false. The metadata for each claim such as date and the entity who made the claim were also collected.
